title: Increasing number of cores for running GATK4 tools.
body:
Hi!
I am very much interested and working over increasing scalability of GATK4 tool performances. There is explicit parameter setting for increased number of nodes over multi-node cluster. But currently I am using single node SPARK cluster and want to check for the GATK4 performances over multi-core machine. What parameter I have to deal with to increase the allotted number of cores?

Waiting for your reply.
